summary: Defines FastAPI routes that implement CRUD operations for configuring pass‑through model endpoints in the LiteLLM proxy, handling requests such as adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting external endpoint definitions, as well as supporting file uploads and initiating fine‑tuning jobs.
business_intent: Enable administrators or users to dynamically manage external AI model endpoints through the proxy service, allowing seamless integration, modification, and removal of custom endpoints and the creation of fine‑tuning jobs without restarting the system.
